content.html: how to quickly climb the big tech career ladder: volunteer for “priority” projects, ship them super fast and land “impact”, then jump onto another “priority”, leaving behind bugs, poor UX and tech debt to other people to solve; rinse and repeat.
content.value:
how to quickly climb the big tech career ladder:

volunteer for “priority” projects, ship them super fast and land “impact”, then jump onto another “priority”, leaving behind bugs, poor UX and tech debt to other people to solve; rinse and repeat.
